text: Marek Marczak (born 17 February 1969) is a Polish Roman Catholic priest who serves as the Auxiliary Bishop of Łódź. == Early life and education == Marek Marczak was born in Piotrków Trybunalski, Poland. He was ordained a priest on 11 June 1994 by Archbishop Janusz Bolonek. == Ecclesiastical career == He was appointed an auxiliary bishop of Łódź in 2015 and consecrated by Archbishop Marek Jędraszewski on 3 May 2015.
